labs.name: 데이터 마이닝 연구실 (Data Mining Lab.)
labs.description: 데이터 마이닝 연구실 (Data Mining Lab.)에서 Data Intelligence, Learning 연구를 수행합니다.

Recent publications.title: SynQ: Accurate Zero-shot Quantization by Synthesis-aware Fine-tuning
Accurate Link Prediction for Edge-Incomplete Graphs via PU Learning
Sequentially Diversified and Accurate Recommendations in Chronological Order for a Series of Users
Fast and Accurate PARAFAC2 Decomposition for Time Range Queries on Irregular Tensors
FreQuant: A Reinforcement-Learning based Adaptive Portfolio Optimization with Multi-frequency Decomposition

labs.name: Intelligent Data Science and Applications Lab (데이터과학 및 응용 연구실)
labs.description: Intelligent Data Science and Applications Lab (데이터과학 및 응용 연구실)에서 데이터 과학, 인공지능, 대형 언어 모델, 추천 시스템, 정보 검색, 데이터/웹 마이닝 연구를 수행합니다.

Recent publications.title: Continual Recommender Systems
DeepRetrieval: Hacking Real Search Engines and Retrievers with Large Language Models via Reinforcement Learning
Imagine All The Relevance: Scenario-Profiled Indexing with Knowledge Expansion for Dense Retrieval
Delving into Instance-Dependent Label Noise in Graph Data: A Comprehensive Study and Benchmark
Embracing Plasticity: Balancing Stability and Plasticity in Continual Recommender Systems
Personalized Preference Reasoning with Large Language Models for Accurate and Explainable Recommendation
Uncertainty Quantification and Decomposition for LLM-based Recommendation
Chain-of-Factors Paper-Reviewer Matching
Improving Scientific Document Retrieval with Concept Coverage-based Query Set Generation

labs.name: Data Mining and Information Systems Lab (데이터마이닝 및 인포메이션시스템 랩)
research_areas: 생물의학 텍스트 마이닝 분야 문제 해결
labs.description: Data Mining and Information Systems Lab (데이터마이닝 및 인포메이션시스템 랩)에서 AI, 머신러닝(ML)을 활용한 생물정보학, 신약 개발, 생물의학 텍스트 마이닝 분야 문제 해결 연구를 수행합니다.

Recent publications.title: Small language models learn enhanced reasoning skills from medical textbooks
BADGER: biologically-aware interpretable differential gene expression ranking model
Augmenting Biomedical Named Entity Recognition with General-domain Resources
MolPLA: A Molecular Pre-training Framework for Learning Cores, R-Groups and their Linker Joints
ETHIC: Evaluating Large Language Models on Long-Context Tasks with High Information Coverage
Rationale-Guided Retrieval Augmented Generation for Medical Question Answering
Ask Optimal Questions: Aligning Large Language Models with Retriever's Preference in Conversational Search

labs.name: IIIXR (Intelligent Immersive Interactive Extended Reality) Lab
labs.description: IIIXR (Intelligent Immersive Interactive Extended Reality) Lab에서 뉴럴 컴퓨터 그래픽스, 가상 에이전트, 확장 현실(XR), 인간-컴퓨터 상호작용(HCI) 연구를 수행합니다.

REVECA: Adaptive Planning and Trajectory-based Validation in Cooperative Language Agents Using Information Relevance and Relative Proximity
P-Hologen: An End-to-End Generative Framework for Phase-Only Holograms
3DStyleGLIP: Part-Tailored Text-Guided 3D Neural Stylization
DARAM: Dynamic Avatar-Human Motion Remapping Technique for Realistic Virtual Stair Ascending Motions
